title: Eduard Bueno
text:
I’m Eduard Bueno, an aspiring data scientist & machine learning engineer passionate about NLP, recommendation systems, and predictive modeling.

🎓 Stats & Data Science @ UCLA

💼 Machine Learning Intern @ Ask Margot

🚀 Developing AI-driven hospital-matching models

I am currently a project competitor with the Algorithmic Justice League, developing a model to predict skin diseases from images. This project leverages deep learning, medical imaging, and fairness-aware AI techniques.
I am actively seeking opportunities in machine learning, data science, and AI-driven applications.


University of California, Los Angeles
B.S. in Statistics and Data Science | June 2025
Cornell University, New York
E-certificate in Machine Learning Foundations | May 2024 - August 2024



Machine Learning Intern | Ask Margot | Sep 2024 - Jan 2025
Lead Instructor | Mathnasium | Dec 2019 - Sep 2024




🏥 Nurse-Hospital Matching System (Ask Margot)

🩺 Skin Disease Prediction Model (Algorithmic Justice League)

📊 Census Income Classifier - ML predictions





Break Through Tech AI Fellow | Cornell x UCLA

Mentor @ Data Science Club | UCLA
